text: Valery Chkalov () is a 1941 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov.Два крыла по плечам: как воздушный хулиган стал «сталинским соколом»Валерий Чкалов (1941) It stars Vladimir Belokurov, Mikheil Gelovani, and Semyon Mezhinsky. ==Actors== * Vladimir Belokurov as Valery Chkalov * Mikheil Gelovani as Joseph Stalin * Semyon Mezhinsky as Sergo Ordzhonikidze * Kseniya Tarasova as Olga Chkalova * Vasili Vanin as Pasha Palic == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1941 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: Valery Chkalov (movie)
